item.title: Don't work more than enough
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Don’t work more than enough Sometimes we push ourselves to the max. maybe because it is there are some deadlines when we are not going to be able to release the new version, maybe it is because our life outside work is not good enough or maybe because we are excited to be working in such a company/technology/team. However, our mental health is going to be damaged by overworking. The question is not how much, but when we are going to get burned out by overworking.
